code: import React from'react';import'../styles/Skills.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Skills=()=>{const skillCategories=[{title:'Programming Languages',skills:['Java','Kotlin','Python','C#','C/C++','SQL']},{title:'Web Development',skills:['HTML','CSS','JavaScript','Typescript','Bootstrap','Vue.js','React.js']},{title:'Development Methodologies',skills:['Agile','Waterfall','SDLC']},{title:'Frameworks',skills:['Spring MVC','Angular','ASP.NET','Spring Boot','Microservices']},{title:'Databases & Storage',skills:['MySQL','NoSQL','Amazon RDS','DynamoDB','Elasticsearch','MongoDB']},{title:'Cloud and Containerization',skills:['AWS EC2','ECS','S3','Lambda','API Gateway','Docker','Kubernetes']},{title:'Source Control and Testing',skills:['Git','GitHub','Selenium IDE']},{title:'Computer Science Fundamentals',skills:['Data Structures','Algorithms']},{title:'Other Skills',skills:['Manual Testing','Bash scripting','Node.js','Azure development']}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"skills",className:"skills",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"TECHNICAL SKILLS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("blockquote",{children:"\"Mastering tools that transform ideas into scalable solutions\""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-grid",children:skillCategories.map((category,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-category",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:category.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-tags",children:category.skills.map((skill,skillIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"skill-tag",children:skill},skillIndex))})]},index))})]});};export default Skills;
